channel.title: Causal Inference on StatWizard
channel.description: Recent content in Causal Inference on StatWizard

item.title: Causal Inference using DAG Models
item.description: Introduction to Causal Analysis using Directed Acylic Graphs (DAG). This is talk prepared as a part of group class project for Categorical Data Analysis course during my M.Stat. in ISI, Kolkata.
